content.question: An object moves along the x-axis with initial position x(0) = 2. The velocity of the object at time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≥</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyyzImRaaGimaaaa@398F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is given by v(t) = <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>sin</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaqadaWdaeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiab ec8aWbWdaeaapeGaaG4maaaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@3E57@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. (a) What is the acceleration of the object at time t = 4?

frqParts.text: An object moves along the x-axis with initial position x(0) = 2. The velocity of the object at time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≥</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyyzImRaaGimaaaa@398F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is given by v(t) = <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>sin</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mfrac> <mi>π</mi> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaqadaWdaeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbiab ec8aWbWdaeaapeGaaG4maaaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@3E57@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. (a) What is the acceleration of the object at time t = 4?

(b) Consider the following two statements. Statement I: For 3 < t < 4.5, the velocity of the object is decreasing. Statement II: For 3 < t < 4.5, the speed of the object is increasing. Are either or both of these statements correct? For each statement provide a reason why it is correct or not correct.

(c) What is the total distance traveled by the object over the time interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaaIWaGaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaisdaaaa@3BF1@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>?
(d) What is the position of the object at time t = 4?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
